content:
HEALTH EQUITY & DISPARITIES
IN A 21st CENTURY PANDEMIC

All faculty scholars, researchers, postdoctoral associates, and students from across the three campuses, along with friends and members from the community, are cordially invited to join us for each of the multi-campus conversations.

The program’s featured participants and guests will be announced in the coming weeks with additional information regarding each session’s program/agenda. Both during and following each conversation, there will be opportunities to share thoughts and participate in Q&A sessions.
